messages.message:
Hey @Balaram
I need to export ground truth set from a flow review but the top bar is not coming, Is there a workaround for that?

can we try the below API?

/api/v1/flow/results/export_as_golden (https://instabase.com/api/v1/flow/results/export_as_golden)

Payload:
```exclude_errors: true
golden_description: "test_ground_truth"
golden_name: "test_ground_truth"
ibresults_path: "ganan.prabaharan/M_and_t/fs/Instabase Drive/MnTMortgage/out/BankStatement/batch.ibflowresults"
input_dataset: "BankStatement"
job_id: "981cc62c-7658-4c20-b32d-680ec23cee35"
output_dir: "/ganan.prabaharan/M_and_t/fs/Instabase Drive/MnTMortgage"```
